mdRecord.dcterms:title: Bushrod Washington's pise greenhouse
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Cremer, James, 1821-1893
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: James Cremer, Publisher of Stereoscopic Views, 18 South Eighth St, Philadelphia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view of Bushrod Washington's earthen or pise greenhouse built adjacent to Washington's original greenhouse (partially destroyed by fire in 1835). To the right of the photograph you can see a portion of the upper garden wall. The greenhouse as well as the surrounding structures are in a state of disrepair. Photograph was taken by James Cremer (Philadelphia), c. 1860. Cremer's printed label is adhered to the reverse of the cardboard mount.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
